mapper.insert: insert into member(name, phoneNumber, coachId, createTime, status) value (#{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{coachId}, now(), #{status})
mapper.update: update member m inner join team_member t on t.memberId = m.id and t.teamId = #{teamId} and m.coachId = #{coachId} set m.name = #{mdto.name}, phoneNumber = #{mdto.phoneNumber} where m.id = #{mdto.id}
update member m inner join team_member t on t.memberId = m.id and t.teamId = #{teamId} and m.coachId = #{coachId} set m.status = -1, t.status = -1 where m.id = #{memberId}
